channel.title: Pages on GENIUS
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on GENIUS

item.title: Genius ITEA4 Project
item.description:
This is the ITEA4 project called Genius. The goal of this international cooperative project is to elaborate the usage of generative A.I. in the software develpment cycle.

The project started end of 2024 and currently, the formal contracts are to be signed. Once this is finished, we will start publishing content on this page.

Stay tuned and come back soon!
